name: Hoard It! (Squiddershins)
description:
Snorri spent his savings on a magic potion to get instant, rock-hard abs!  But he ended up getting rock-hard everything!  With the help of his buddy, Baggi, they are hoarding all the treasure they can carry back to the store to pay for a potion to soften Snorri's stony form.  Avoid enemies, grab the treasure, and leave the fighting to your buff golem buddy in this evasive action arcade game.

Hoard It! was designed for the A Game By Its Cover (AGBIC) competition. The premise of the competition was to design a game based upon a previously existing fictitious game cartridge. Hoard It! was based upon Hoard It! by Nick Holland.

The audio was done by Daryl Ward from the Pink and Yellow glam band The DandyLions!
